text: "Faster Than the Speed of Night" is a 1983 song by Welsh singer Bonnie Tyler and is the title track from her fourth studio album Faster Than the Speed of Night. It went to number 9 in Norway, number 17 in Ireland and number 43 in the United Kingdom. == Track listing == ; 7" single # "Faster Than the Speed of Night" — 3:30 # "Gonna Get Better" — 3:06 ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Bonnie Tyler songs
title: Faster Than the Speed of Night (song)
